channel.title: GraveScape 2.0 (508)
channel.description:
Hi everybody,
I'd like to introduce you to GraveScape, a server like it should be. Realistic game-play and unique features! Wanted to be a skiller, but got tired of searching after finding nothing but servers with half-working skills and non-realistic XP rates? Check out GraveScape! A professional staff team and a dedicated community, aswell as a stable economy.
Server Forums: GraveScape.co.cc
This server is the solution to anyone who is getting tired and frustrated by all PK servers out there. Not to mention non-realistic skills, npcs, drops, xp rates, economy, commands and last but not least, badly programmed features.
GraveScape has a realistic gameplay, realistic NPC Drops, realistic XP rates, realistic skills and is programmed like it should be.
* All skills trainable like real RuneScape, except for Construction. * Full Trading * Full Shops * Full Clan-Chat * Personal Shops * Pet Dragons * Highscores * LOTS MORE!
Enough of this advertising crap, if you want to find out more, don't hesitate to visit GraveScape 2.0 to check it out yourself.
[IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/2500/skillcapes.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/3641/chatmw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/7299/slayerprayersummon.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i224.photobucket.com/albums/dd287/relinquish90/grave%20scape/starter20.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i224.photobucket.com/albums/dd287/relinquish90/grave%20scape/starter14.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/1470/ownerhelp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/3070/learning.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://gravescape.org/forums/download/file.php?id=6[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/hsj8nn.png[/img]
[img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/8646/forumvialfillingev5.png[/img]
[img]http://img187.imageshack.us/img187/3204/forumherbscleaningtf9.png[/img]
[img]http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/2161/forumsmeltingjh8.png[/img]
[img]http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/7300/forumashesai6.png[/img]
